description.english: Take the first step to freedom.
description.german: Wage den ersten Schritt in die Freiheit.
description.french: Faites le premier pas vers la liberté.
description.italian: Prime scodate verso la libertà.
description.spanish: Da el primer paso hacia la libertad.
description.schinese: 踏出迈向自由的第一步。
description.tchinese: 向自由邁出第一步。
description.japanese: 自由への第一歩を踏みだす。
description.brazilian: Dê o primeiro passo para a liberdade.

description.english: Curse this spherical prison!
description.german: Verflucht sei dieses runde Gefängnis!
description.french: Maudite soit cette prison sphérique !
description.italian: Al diavolo questa prigione sferica!
description.spanish: ¡Que le den a esta prisión esférica!
description.tchinese: 詛咒這個球形監獄！
description.japanese: こんな球体監獄なんてまっぴらだ！
description.brazilian: Maldita seja essa prisão esférica!

description.english: Get the goldfish to the ocean.
description.german: Bringe den Goldfisch ins Meer.
description.french: Amenez le poisson rouge jusqu’à l’océan.
description.italian: Conduci il pesce rosso all'oceano.
description.spanish: Lleva a la carpa dorada al océano.
description.tchinese: 把金魚帶到海裡去。
description.russian: Помогите золотой рыбке добраться до океана.
description.japanese: 金魚を海まで連れて行く。
description.brazilian: Leve o peixinho dourado até o oceano.

description.english: Get the Pufferfish to the ocean.
description.german: Bringe den Kugelfisch ins Meer.
description.french: Amenez le poisson-globe jusqu’à l’océan.
description.italian: Conduci il pesce palla all'oceano.
description.spanish: Lleva al pez globo al océano.
description.tchinese: 把河豚帶到海裡去。
description.japanese: フグを海まで連れて行く。
description.brazilian: Leve o baiacu até o oceano.

description.english: Get the Piranha to the ocean.
description.german: Bringe den Piranha ins Meer.
description.french: Amenez le piranha jusqu’à l’océan.
description.italian: Conduci il piranha all'oceano.
description.spanish: Lleva a la piraña al océano.
description.tchinese: 把食人魚帶到海裡去。
description.japanese: ピラニアを海まで連れて行く。
description.brazilian: Leve a piranha até o oceano.

description.english: Get the Flying Fish to the ocean.
description.german: Bringe den Fliegenden Fisch ins Meer.
description.french: Amenez le poisson volant jusqu’à l’océan.
description.italian: Conduci il pesce volante all'oceano.
description.spanish: Lleva al pez volador al océano.
description.tchinese: 把飛魚帶到海裡去。
description.russian: Помогите летучей рыбе добраться до океана.
description.japanese: トビウオを海まで連れて行く。
description.brazilian: Leve o peixe-voador até o oceano.

description.english: Reunite the four fish friends!
description.german: Bringe die vier Fischfreunde zusammen.
description.french: Réunissez les quatre amis écailleux.
description.italian: Riunisci i quattro amici pesci.
description.koreana: 네 마리 물고기 친구들을 재회하게 하세요.
description.spanish: Reúne a los cuatro peces amigos.
description.tchinese: 讓這四個魚朋友重聚。
description.japanese: 4匹の魚友達を再会させる。
description.brazilian: Reúna os quatro amigos peixes.

description.english: Don't give up now! You almost made it!
description.german: Jetzt nicht aufgeben. Du hast es fast geschafft!
description.french: N’abandonnez pas maintenant. Vous y étiez presque !
description.italian: Non arrenderti adesso! C'eri quasi!
description.spanish: No te desanimes ahora. ¡Casi lo tienes!
description.schinese: 不要放弃。你差一点就成功了呢！
description.tchinese: 現在不要放棄。你幾乎做到了！
description.russian: Не сдавайтесь. У вас почти получилось!
description.japanese: 諦めるのはまだ早い。ゴールはすぐそこ！
description.brazilian: Não desista agora. Você quase conseguiu!

description.english: Get all the fish back in the ocean... with some extra friends!
description.german: Bringe alle Fische – und noch ein paar weitere Freunde – zurück ins Meer.
description.french: Ramenez tous les poissons dans l’océan… avec quelques amis en plus !
description.italian: Riporta tutti i pesci nell'oceano... con degli amici in più!
description.koreana: 모든 물고기를 바다로 돌려보내세요... 몇 명의 친구들과 함께!
description.spanish: Lleva a todos los peces al océano... ¡con algunos amigos más!
description.schinese: 让所有的鱼儿都回到大海……还多了几个朋友！
description.tchinese: 和其他朋友……把所有魚帶回海裡去！
description.russian: Помогите всем рыбкам добраться до океана... вместе с новыми друзьями!
description.japanese: 全ての魚を海に戻す。(他の友達も一緒！)
description.brazilian: Devolva todos os peixes para o oceano... com alguns amigos extras!

displayName.english: Where No Fish Has Gone Before
displayName.german: Ein großer Schritt für die Fischheit
displayName.french: Où nul poisson n’a jamais mis la nageoire
displayName.italian: Là dove nessun pesce era mai andato
displayName.koreana: 어떤 물고기도 가본 적 없는 곳
displayName.spanish: Donde ningún pez ha estado antes
displayName.schinese: 从来没有鱼去过的地方
displayName.tchinese: 這是以前沒有魚到過的地方
displayName.russian: Там, где не колыхался рыбий плавник

description.english: Find your place among the stars.
description.german: Finde deinen Platz in den Sternen.
description.french: Trouvez votre place parmi les étoiles.
description.italian: Trova il tuo posto tra le stelle.
description.spanish: Encuentra tu lugar entre las estrellas.
description.tchinese: 在群星中找到你的位置。
description.japanese: 宇宙で自分の居場所を見つける。
description.brazilian: Encontre seu lugar entre as estrelas.

description.english: Complete your secret mission.
description.german: Schließe deine geheime Mission ab.
description.french: Terminez votre mission secrète.
description.italian: Completa la tua missione segreta.
description.spanish: Completa tu misión secreta.
description.tchinese: 完成你的神秘任務。
description.japanese: 秘密のミッションを完了する。
description.brazilian: Complete sua missão secreta.

displayName.japanese: キミはスターフィッシュ！
displayName.brazilian: Você é uma estrela do mar!

description.english: Get a 5 Star rating on any level.
description.german: Erhalte in einem beliebigen Level eine Bewertung von fünf Sternen.
description.french: Obtenez une note de 5 étoiles dans n’importe quel niveau.
description.italian: Ottieni una valutazione di 5 stelle in qualsiasi livello.
description.spanish: Obtén una valoración de 5 estrellas en cualquier nivel.
description.tchinese: 在任何關卡中獲得 5 星評價。
description.russian: Получите пятизвездочный рейтинг на любом из уровней.
description.japanese: いずれかのレベルで5つ星を獲得する。
description.brazilian: Consiga uma classificação de 5 estrelas em qualquer nível.

displayName.italian: Questa sì che è roba buona

description.english: Find your first bread collectable.
description.german: Finde deinen ersten Brot-Sammelgegenstand.
description.french: Trouvez votre premier pain à collectionner.
description.italian: Trova il tuo primo pane collezionabile.
description.spanish: Encuentra tu primer coleccionable de pan.
description.schinese: 找到你的第一块面包收藏品。
description.tchinese: 找到你的第一個麵包收藏品。
description.japanese: 1つ目のパンアイテムを見つける。
description.brazilian: Encontre seu primeiro pão colecionável.

displayName.spanish: Más largo que un día sin pan

description.english: Find all bread collectables on a level.
description.german: Finde in einem Level alle Brot-Sammelgegenstände.
description.french: Trouvez tous les pains à collectionner d’un niveau.
description.italian: Trova tutto il pane collezionabile in un livello.
description.koreana: 한 레벨에서 빵 수집품을 전부 찾으세요.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los coleccionables de pan en un nivel.
description.schinese: 在一关里找到所有的面包收藏品。
description.tchinese: 在一個關卡中找到所有麵包收藏品。
description.russian: Найдите все куски хлеба на уровне.
description.japanese: いずれかのレベルで全てのパンアイテムを見つける。
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os pães colecionáveis em um nível.

description.english: Get 5 stars on every level.
description.german: Erhalte in jedem Level fünf Sterne.
description.french: Obtenez 5 étoiles dans chaque niveau.
description.italian: Ottieni 5 stelle in ciascun livello.
description.spanish: Obtén 5 estrellas en todos los niveles.
description.tchinese: 在所有關卡中獲得 5 星評價。
description.russian: Получите по 5 звезд на всех уровнях.
description.japanese: 全てのレベルで5つ星を獲得する。
description.brazilian: Consiga 5 estrelas em todos os níveis.

description.english: Collect every piece of bread.
description.german: Sammle das ganze Brot auf.
description.french: Récoltez tous les morceaux de pain.
description.italian: Raccogli ogni pezzo di pane.
description.spanish: Consigue todos los panes.
description.tchinese: 收集所有麵包。
description.japanese: 全てのパンの欠片を収集する。
description.brazilian: Colete todos os pedaços de pão.

displayName.english: You Thought This Game Was Easy?
displayName.german: Dachtest wohl, das Spiel wird leicht?
displayName.french: Vous pensiez que ce jeu était simple ?
displayName.italian: Credevi che questo fosse un gioco facile?
displayName.schinese: 你以为这个游戏很容易吗？
displayName.tchinese: 你覺得這個遊戲很簡單？
displayName.japanese: 簡単なゲームだと思いきや？
displayName.brazilian: Achou que esse jogo seria fácil?

description.english: Complete the game in Iron Fish mode with Bossa Style controls
description.german: Schließe das Spiel im Eisenfisch-Modus mit der Bossa-Stil-Steuerung ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode Iron Fish avec les commandes du style Bossa.
description.italian: Completa il gioco in modalità Iron Fish con i controlli stile Bossa.
description.koreana: 강철 물고기 모드의 보사 스타일 컨트롤로 게임을 완료하세요
description.spanish: Completa el juego en modo Pez de hierro con los controles de estilo Bossa.
description.schinese: 选择钢铁鱼模式，使用Bossa风操控完成游戏
description.tchinese: 在「鐵魚」模式中用博薩方式的控制完成遊戲
description.russian: Пройдите игру в режиме «Железная рыба» с управлением «Босса-стиль».
description.japanese: Bossaスタイル操作を使用して鉄の魚モードでゲームをクリアする。
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo no modo Peixe de Ferro com controles Estilo Bossa.

displayName.brazilian: Eu sou o Peixe de Ferro

description.english: Complete the game in Iron Fish mode
description.german: Schließe das Spiel im Eisenfisch-Modus ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode Iron Fish.
description.italian: Completa il gioco in modalità Iron Fish
description.spanish: Completa el juego en el modo Pez de hierro.
description.schinese: 使用钢铁鱼模式完成游戏
description.tchinese: 在「鐵魚」模式中完成遊戲
description.japanese: 鉄の魚モードでゲームをクリアする。
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo no modo Peixe de Ferro

displayName.spanish: Para mear y no echar gota

description.english: Not the most glamourous of escapes.
description.german: Keine besonders glamouröse Flucht.
description.french: On a vu plus glamour comme évasion.
description.italian: Non è tra le fughe più decorose.
description.spanish: No ha sido la huida más elegante de todas.
description.schinese: 这样的逃跑可真是狼狈。
description.tchinese: 這不是最吸引人的逃跑方式。
description.japanese: 華やかな脱出とは言い難い。
description.brazilian: Uma fuga não muito glamorosa.

displayName.french: Faut pas le laisser filer, celui-là

description.english: Fight the fisherman for over 40 seconds.
description.german: Kämpfe länger als 40 Sekunden gegen den Angler.
description.french: Luttez contre le pêcheur pendant plus de 40 secondes.
description.italian: Lotta col pescatore per più di 40 secondi.
description.spanish: Combate contra el pescador más de 40 segundos.
description.tchinese: 和這個漁夫戰鬥超過 40 秒。
description.russian: Сопротивляйтесь рыбаку в течение 40 секунд и более.
description.japanese: 40秒以上漁師と戦う。
description.brazilian: Lute com o pescador por mais de 40 segundos.

displayName.english: What did you expect to happen?
displayName.brazilian: O que você esperava que fosse acontecer?

description.english: Pull out the plug in the bath.
description.german: Ziehe den Stöpsel im Bad.
description.french: Retirez le bouchon de la baignoire.
description.italian: Togli il tappo alla vasca da bagno.
description.spanish: Desconecta el enchufe en el baño.
description.tchinese: 把浴缸裡的塞子拔出來
description.japanese: お風呂の栓を抜く。
description.brazilian: Tire a tampa do ralo da banheira.

description.english: Jumped too early.
description.german: Zu früh gesprungen.
description.french: Un peu trop tôt, ce saut.
description.italian: Salta troppo presto.
description.spanish: Has saltado demasiado rápido.
description.tchinese: 跳的太早。
description.japanese: 早く飛びすぎ。
description.brazilian: Pulou muito cedo.

description.english: Escape Nigel in less than 3 minutes.
description.german: Entkomme Nigel in weniger als 3 Minuten.
description.french: Échappez à Nigel en moins de 3 minutes.
description.italian: Fuggi da Nigel in meno di 3 minuti.
description.spanish: Escapa de Nigel en menos de 3 minutos.
description.tchinese: 3 分鐘內逃離 Nigel
description.russian: Сбежать от Найджела меньше чем за 3 минуты.
description.japanese: 3分以内にナイジェルから逃げ切る。
description.brazilian: Fuja de Nigel em menos de 3 minutos.

description.english: In Forest Stream do not alert the seagulls.
description.german: Mache im Waldbach keine Möwen auf dich aufmerksam.
description.french: Dans Ruisseau forestier, n’alertez pas les mouettes.
description.italian: Non farti notare dai gabbiani al ruscello nella foresta.
description.koreana: 숲 속 시내에서는 갈매기의 주의를 끌지 마세요.
description.spanish: No pongas sobre aviso a las gaviotas en el riachuelo del bosque.
description.schinese: 在森林溪流里，不要惊动海鸥。
description.tchinese: 在森林溪流中不要驚動海鷗。
description.russian: Не распугать чаек на Лесном ручье.
description.japanese: フォレスト・ストリームでカモメにケンカを売らない。
description.brazilian: Não alerte as gaivotas no Riacho da Floresta.

description.english: Get Greg to the bathroom in less than 3 minutes.
description.german: Bringe Greg in weniger als drei Minuten ins Bad.
description.french: Amenez Greg aux toilettes en moins de 3 minutes.
description.italian: Fai raggiungere il bagno a Greg in meno di 3 minuti.
description.spanish: Lleva a Greg al baño en menos de 3 minutos.
description.schinese: 让Greg在3分钟之内进入浴室。
description.tchinese: 3 分鐘內把 Greg 帶到浴室。
description.russian: Привести Грега в уборную меньше чем за 3 минуты.
description.japanese: 3分以内にグレッグをトイレに連れて行く。
description.brazilian: Leve Greg até o banheiro em menos de 3 minutos.

description.english: Smash all the fishbowls in the Aquarium.
description.german: Zertrümmere alle Fischgläser im Aquarium.
description.french: Brisez tous les bocaux à poissons dans l’aquarium.
description.italian: Rompi tutte le bocce da pesci nell'acquario.
description.spanish: Destroza todas las peceras en el acuario.
description.schinese: 打破水族馆里的所有鱼缸。
description.tchinese: 砸毀水族館中的所有魚缸。
description.russian: Разбить все круглые аквариумы в Океанариуме.
description.japanese: 水族館の全ての金魚鉢を粉砕する。
description.brazilian: Esmague todos os aquários no Aquarium.

displayName.japanese: ハンマーサンドイッチ

description.english: It's unconventional, but it works.
description.german: Etwas unkonventionell, aber es funktioniert.
description.french: Pas très conventionnel, mais ça fonctionne.
description.italian: Non è convenzionale, ma funziona.
description.spanish: Es poco convencional, pero funciona.
description.tchinese: 這雖然不符合慣例，但有效。
description.japanese: 型破りだけど有効。
description.brazilian: Não é convencional, mas funciona.

description.english: Uncover remnants of a lost world.
description.german: Enthülle die Überreste einer verlorenen Welt.
description.french: Découvrez les vestiges d’un monde perdu.
description.italian: Scopri le tracce di un mondo perduto.
description.spanish: Descubre los restos de un mundo perdido.
description.tchinese: 發現迷失世界的遺蹟。
description.japanese: 失われた世界の名残りを発見。
description.brazilian: Descubra resquícios de um mundo perdido.

description.english: Earn every achievement.
description.german: Erhalte jede Errungenschaft.
description.french: Terminez tous les succès.
description.italian: Raggiungi tutti gli obiettivi.
description.spanish: Consigue todos los logros.
description.tchinese: 贏得所有成就。
description.japanese: 全ての実績を獲得する。
description.brazilian: Obtenha todas as conquistas.
